thread.title: Great boutique hotel with excellent dining and location!
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel with excellent dining and location! - Review of Park South Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jrtraynor
title: Great boutique hotel with excellent dining and location!
text: The staff at check in was great! Friendly, helpful, and prompt. I requested a room with a fridge (traveling with children) when I booked online through a third party site, and one was promptly brought up to the room at arrival without me reminding them! The renovation in 2016 was well done. It's a beautiful hotel! The small exercise room was nice. For an NYC hotel room with two double beds, it was incredibly spacious. On the 7th floor we heard no noise with a courtyard window. Covina restaurant has awesome salads and pizza and friendly staff. Great location for the metro and other restaurants. Bagel shop next door was super friendly and delicious.
